contact-form.title: Contact us
contact-form.h1: We are here to help you. We will try to answer you in less than 48 hours.
contact-form.success_message: Your message has been sent successfully

ayuda.default_text: Here you will find practical videos and answers to the most common questions about how Gallopinto Calendar can help you manage the day-to-day life of older people and thus help them to be independent for a longer time.
ayuda.default_video_text: Discover some of the uses you can give to Gallopinto Calendar. You can program it, for example, so that a voice message from you or your grandchildren wakes you up in the morning, or as a reminder that in half an hour the girl arrives cleaning, or that you have been to eat at that time, or that it would simply be a good time to eat ... You will discover a thousand and one utilities that will help you remember your appointments and daily tasks, and feel the family and loved ones closer.
ayuda.default_faq_text: Then you can find the answers to the most common questions
